text: Vitor Hugo Naum dos Santos (born 1 April 1999), commonly known as Vitinho, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a forward for Athletico Paranaense. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== 0 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Athletico Paranaense |2018 |rowspan="3"|Série A |0||0||4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||0 |- |2019 |16||2||9||2||4||0||2Appearances in Copa Libertadores||0||0||0||31||4 |- |2020 |0||0||4||0||0||0||1||0||0||0||5||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !16!!2!!17!!2!!4!!0!!3!!0!!0!!0!!40!!4 |} ==Honours== Athletico Paranaense *Campeonato Paranaense: 2019 *J.League Cup / Copa Sudamericana Championship: 2019 *Copa do Brasil: 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Athletico official profile * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from São José dos Campos Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Club Athletico Paranaense players
